SELECT count( t.id ) as count, d.day
,(CASE register_type WHEN 'iOS' then 1 when 'Android' then 2 END) as type
,'1' as type
,'2' as type
FROM d left join ( SELECT t1.id
,DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS create_time
,DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS create_time
,t2.register_source register_type
FROM tbl_passenger_info t1 left join tbl_passenger_register_source t2 on t1.id=t2.passenger_info_id
AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
AND t2.register_source = (case #{equipment} when 1 then 'iOS' when 2 then 'Android' end)
AND t2.register_source in('iOS','Android')
) t on d.day = t.create_time GROUP BY d.day
,register_type

select count(distinct passenger_info_id ) as count, d.day
,source as type
,'1' as type
,'2' as type
,service_type as serviceType from d left join (select passenger_info_id,service_type
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS start_time
,DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS start_time
,(CASE WHEN source ='iOS' then 1 WHEN source ='ios' then 1 when source ='Android' then 2 END) as source
from tbl_order where status IN (6,7,8)
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( start_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
and source in('iOS','ios','Android')
and source in('iOS','ios')
and source = 'Android'
) t on d.day = t.start_time GROUP BY d.day,t.service_type
,t.source

SELECT count( t.id ) as count, d.day
,(CASE register_type WHEN 'iOS' then 1 when 'Android' then 2 END) as type
,'1' as type
,'2' as type
FROM d left join ( SELECT t1.id, t2.register_source register_type
,DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d' ) AS last_login_time
,DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m' ) AS last_login_time
FROM tbl_passenger_info t1 left join tbl_passenger_register_source t2 on t1.id=t2.passenger_info_id
AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') >= DATE_FORMAT(#{begin}, '%Y-%m-%d') AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m-%d') <= DATE_FORMAT(#{end}, '%Y-%m-%d')
AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m' ) >= #{begin} AND DATE_FORMAT( t1.last_login_time, '%Y-%m' ) <= #{end}
AND t2.register_source = (case #{equipment} when 1 then 'iOS' when 2 then 'Android' end)
AND t2.register_source in('iOS','Android')
) t on d.day = t.last_login_time GROUP BY d.day
,register_type
